column2: How can I use this system
column3: I know it’s kind of uncomfortable asking questions like this, especially on the spot. What’s been on your mind? Looking for birth control? You can ask me, “Where can I get birth control? How much does it cost?" And even, "How do I talk to a doctor about it?” Heard something crazy about STDs? Ask me, “How do I prevent STDs?" or "Where can I get tested?” Nothing’s off limits here!
